title: Bobolink Presents the Largest Pan-Arab Anti-Drug Campaign "Ma Btefro' Ma'eh"
content:
SOURCE Bobolink Creative Boutique

BEIRUT 

The issues of drugs and drug addiction have always been a taboo in the Arab world, to the extent that - up until this day - there are no official statistics about the matter.

(Photo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150909/264803 )

Bobolink Creative Boutique, located in Beirut, Lebanon 

Lebanese actress Aimee Sayah 

Moreover, a press conference took place earlier today in Beirut 

ABOUT Bobolink Creative Boutique - Founded in 2011, Bobolink is an award-winning social media and PR agency offering services under the umbrellas of Digital Marketing, Advertising, and Design. Bobolink currently serves the MENA region with offices in Beirut, Lebanon
